expected_violation.legal_basis: LL149 - Local Law 149 of 2026 (The One-Job Rule)
expected_violation.explanation: Construction Superintendent John Smith is designated as Primary on 2 active permits. NYC Local Law 149 limits each CS to ONE primary designation to ensure adequate on-site supervision and prevent CS over-extension.
expected_violation.suggested_action: Reassign superintendent or close out prior permit to satisfy one-job rule.
